feedbackPanelMentoringDiscussion.pending:
**Functional Purpose**: Bolded confirmation that the user has submitted their solution for Code Review
**UI Location**: Feedback Panel → Mentoring Discussion (Pending state)
**When Users See This**: When a user has submitted a solution for code review and is waiting for feedback.
**Technical Context**: Part of a larger paragraph; no special formatting besides bolding.
**Current English**: "You've submitted your solution for Code Review."

**Functional Purpose**: Informational text indicating a mentor will provide feedback soon.
**UI Location**: Feedback Panel → Mentoring Discussion (Pending state)
**When Users See This**: When a user has submitted a solution for code review and is waiting for feedback.
**Technical Context**: Follows a bolded statement. Informs about notifications.
**Current English**: "A mentor will (hopefully) provide you with feedback soon. You'll recieve a notification and email when this happens."

**Functional Purpose**: Button text to navigate to the mentoring request details.
**UI Location**: Feedback Panel → Mentoring Discussion (Pending state), below the informational text
**When Users See This**: When a user has submitted a solution for code review and is waiting for feedback.
**Technical Context**: Standard button text. Clicking navigates to `mentoringRequestLink`.
**Current English**: "View your request"
feedbackPanel.codeReview:
**Functional Purpose**: Summary title for the Code Review section in the Feedback Panel.
**UI Location**: Feedback Panel header for a completed or ongoing discussion.
**When Users See This**: When a code review discussion is available or ongoing.
**Technical Context**: Text for the `summary` prop of `FeedbackDetail`.
**Current English**: "Code Review"
feedbackPanelMentoringDiscussion.feedbac:
**Functional Purpose**: Loading indicator text for the mentoring discussion content.
**UI Location**: Feedback Panel → Mentoring Discussion
**When Users See This**: While the discussion posts are being fetched.
**Technical Context**: Displayed when the `useRequestQuery` status is 'pending'.
**Current English**: "Loading…"
feedbackPanel.codeReviewPending:
**Functional Purpose**: Summary title for the pending Code Review section in the Feedback Panel.
**UI Location**: Feedback Panel header when a mentoring request is pending.
**When Users See This**: When a mentoring request has been submitted but no discussion has started yet.
**Technical Context**: Text for the `summary` prop of `FeedbackDetail`.
**Current English**: "Code Review (Pending)"
